BURN BURN BURN... @redskies not all asian countries are like that.. in my country the rapist got reclusion perpetua for what they have done.. while the victims got treatment for the trauma they got for what happened to them,, they sympathized the victim and support her to start over.. and also instead of being contempted they praise the victim of having a courage to denounce the offenders..
guys....you take this WAY to serious, lol

Exactly. Shit like this would work in the mind of a Japanese person because the attitudes towards sexual abuse and victims could be different than those in non Asian countries. It's more likely that a woman will be shamed and blamed for being abused than the one who actually forced himself on her. That's the conclusion I got from a text I read years ago. It told the case of a girl who got raped by a teacher and caught an STD from him, and the reactions she got after denouncing the abuse were of contempt from her surroundings. They blamed her for "ruining" the teacher's life because he was old and had a lot to lose, while she could get "another chance" in life because she was "still young". Asians fear shame and the prospect of dealing with shame and bringing shame to their families may make sexual abuse hard for a woman to deal with. Even the police there tends to mistreat rape victims.

You all think that the entire world works with a common western english speakers logicish. Just so you know this kind of works are like this because there is a precedent in real life. Yes, japanese culture is fucked up at a fundamental level and rape is one of the negative fetishes that Japan share as a nation in a messed up way. There is a case of a young girl raped and tortured to death where the culprits walk free and without regrets to this day. And the reaction of the mc in this work probably reflects the guilt that all japanese should feel to this day because they let it happen.

The girl is pretty well-drawn; other than that, it's just another brain-dead kidnap & rape story with a nonsensical ending that only serves to fuel negative emotions to the readers, riddled with only hentai logic (what cops, what parents, what money). At least, the story is split into two with different perspectives, a technique to appeal to readers to get more immersive into it.
